name: Easy Digital Downloads – Terms Per Product
author: Sandhills Development, LLC

sections.description:
Allow terms of use to be specified on a per-product basis for Easy Digital Downloads.

This is an extension for Easy Digital Downloads and does not function on its own.
sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin
  2. Add the Terms of Use for each product from the Download edit screen
sections.changelog:
1.0.7: March 29, 2021

  • Fix: “Agree to Terms” label wasn’t available for translation.
  • Tweak: Updated plugin author name to Sandhills Development, LLC.
  • Dev: Updated code to add PHPDocs and follow WPCS.

1.0.6: December 3, 2017

  • Allow ‘target’ attribute in terms anchor tags
  • Remove empty checkout markup when no product terms are present

1.0.5: July 14, 2016

  • Updated plugin authors

1.0.4: May 25, 2016

  • Fix: Incorrect markup structure for label and input field on checkout

1.0.3: May 13, 2014

  • Fixed a bug that prevented checkouts from being processed

1.0.2: May 13, 2014

  • Fixed a bug that caused the terms to not show properly when multiple gateways were active
  • Moved the Terms of Use meta field to the Download Settings box

1.0.1: August 1, 2013

  • Fixed a position issue with where the terms where displayed on checkout
  • Fixed an issue when purchasing multiple price options of the same product

1.0: July 11, 2013

  • First offical release!
